Sentencas: In this paper, a renewable-based integrated energy system is developed, analyzed, and optimized to achieve better performance.
Titulo: Assessment and Evolutionary Based Multi-Objective Optimization of a Novel Renewable-Based Polygeneration Energy System

Sentencas: The present system is designed to be driven by concentrated solar thermal and biomass energies.
Titulo: Assessment and Evolutionary Based Multi-Objective Optimization of a Novel Renewable-Based Polygeneration Energy System

Sentencas: Biomass fuel is used as the backup source of energy when the solar energy is not available.
Titulo: Assessment and Evolutionary Based Multi-Objective Optimization of a Novel Renewable-Based Polygeneration Energy System

Sentencas: The system is designed to produce electricity, cooling, and hydrogen.
Titulo: Assessment and Evolutionary Based Multi-Objective Optimization of a Novel Renewable-Based Polygeneration Energy System

Sentencas: The power output of the system is provided by solar-driven regenerative helium gas turbine during day time and from biomass gasification driven solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit at night time.
Titulo: Assessment and Evolutionary Based Multi-Objective Optimization of a Novel Renewable-Based Polygeneration Energy System

Sentencas: The fuel cell stack number is estimated as to provide the same net power.
Titulo: Assessment and Evolutionary Based Multi-Objective Optimization of a Novel Renewable-Based Polygeneration Energy System

Sentencas: The system operates at energy and exergy efficiencies of 39.99% and 27.47%, respectively, at the optimal point selected based on the optimization analysis.
Titulo: Assessment and Evolutionary Based Multi-Objective Optimization of a Novel Renewable-Based Polygeneration Energy System

Sentencas: The parametric studies on performance and environmental impact assessment are performed to investigate the effects of several operating parameters on the system performance.
Titulo: Assessment and Evolutionary Based Multi-Objective Optimization of a Novel Renewable-Based Polygeneration Energy System
